functions


misc functions on numbers


m_almost_zerod

bool m_almost_zerod(double val);
type: C function
description: checks if a double is almost zero (0.000000000001 precision)

m_almost_equald

bool m_almost_equald(double a, double b);
type: C function
description: checks if two doubles are almost equal (0.000000000001 precision)

type: C function
description: returns max value between two uint64

description: returns min value between two uint64

description: returns linear interpolation between two doubles

description: returns double percentage of x based on max

description: returns log / log2

m_coefd

double m_coefd(double far_plane);
type: C function
description: returns 2 / log2(far_plane + 1)

m_triangle_heightd

double m_triangle_heightd(double v);
type: C function
description: returns v * sqrt(3) / 2

description: returns greatest common divider between a & b
